sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Carinfo} from "../../carinfo"; @Component({ selector: 'app-car-info', template: `

{{ carinfo.name }}

{{ carinfo.city}}, {{carinfo.state }}

Подробней Подробней
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel soluta!Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel soluta! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel soluta! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel soluta! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel soluta! Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vel soluta!
`, styleUrls: ['./car-info.component.css'] }) export class CarInfoComponent { @Input() carinfo!: Carinfo; }
